32: speaker
portraits
msg
Finally, we arrived. Thank god~
呼…终于到站了。还好在轻轨上遇到一列能动的电车，不然光靠腿走可是要累死在轨道上的…看来下次设计线路的时候得考虑一下体能了。
はぁー、やっと駅についた。電車が動いてくれて助かったよ。もし、徒歩でここまで歩くことになってたら、疲れて死んじゃってたかも……。今度からは、体力のことも考えて行動を決めるようにしないとね。
하아, 드디어 역에 도착했어. 기차가 움직여줘서 다행이야. 만약 걸어서 여기까지 왔더라면 지쳐 죽었을지도... 다음부턴 체력도 고려해서 행동해야겠어.

Ahhh, finally we're at the station. I'm glad the train was running. If we had to walk all the way here, I would have died of exhaustion... Next time, I'll have to think about physical strength when making plans.

Phew...finally arrived at the station. Luckily, I met a moving tram on the light rail, otherwise I would have died on the track just by walking on my legs... It seems that next time when designing the line, I have to take physical fitness into consideration.

Huh, I finally got to the station. Thank goodness the train is running. If I had had to walk all the way here on foot, I would have died of exhaustion. ...... Next time, I'll have to consider my physical strength when deciding what to do.
